medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The sores had been present for roughly 5 weeks. The patient also has a history of bedwetting for the past 12 months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Born macrosomic (4.5 kg) at 38 weeks by caesarean section after a pregnancy complicated by poorly controlled gestational diabetes; obesity.
medical_history.family_history: Strong family history of type 2 diabetes.
medical_history.social_history: Diet consisted of high portions of refined carbohydrates and simple sugars; not specified.
